title: Exercise 3-5
description: Fill in the missing numbers in the following table:

questions.name: grid_table
questions.html:
Customers of WD or WBHCustomer of WBHNot Customer of WBH
Customer of WD
Not Customer of WD0

The number of customers WD and WBH have in common is 93. The number of customers of WD who are not customers of WBH is 132−93 = 39. WBH has 3310 customers in all, of whom 93 are customers of WD, so the number of customers of WBH who are not customers of WD is 3310−93 = 3217.
questions.description:
Based on the given information:
• Both WD and WBH customers: 93
• WD customers who are not WBH customers: 132 - 93 = 39
• WBH customers who are not WD customers: 3310 - 93 = 3217
